history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00504
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A FREE BASIC MEDICINE ASSISTANCE PROGRAM IN ALL GOVERNMENT HEALTH FACILITIES NATIONWIDE AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : Free Basic Medicine Assistance Act
ABSTRACT : Provides free medicines in all district hospitals, local health units and barangay health centers.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, VICTOR A.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Catamco (010 2016-08-15)2. Montoro (017 2016-08-31)
3. Panotes (039 2016-10-19)4. Espino (047 2016-11-22)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-02-22
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-02-22
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 104, 233, 504, 1505 and 1968 was approved with amendments.
      3. Committee Report filed on 2017-05-31
          -Period of Interpellation
MOTHER BILL: HB05808
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2016-07-27
